last_episode_to_air.name: Bringing Sexy Back
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jesse and Kirsten are bringing sexy back in more ways than one. This Night Calls has Playmates spilling secrets from the Bunny Book and some good old-fashion lap dances.

name: Night Calls
overview: Night Calls is an American sexuality-oriented television series on Playboy TV that was broadcast from 1995 to 2007.
